name: Mahmoud Fazeli
title: AI Engineer / Data Analyst / Prompt Engineer

summary.content: AI Engineer with 4+ years of experience in Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), NLP, and deep learning. Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and prompt engineering, with a successful track record of deploying advanced AI solutions in business and research environments. Expertise in using tools like LangChain, LlamaIndex, and Azure to build scalable, data-augmented AI applications. Familiar with popular tools and trends like vector databases (e.g., Pinecone) and large-scale LLM deployments. Recognized for creating AI-driven solutions that streamline business processes, with extensive experience in leading cross-functional projects. Awarded **Employee of the Quarter (Q3 2024)** for spearheading impactful AI initiatives that optimized company performance. Passionate about continuous innovation and learning in AI technologies.

responsibilities: Developed LLM-based chatbots to enhance customer engagement and improve service metrics.

responsibilities.text: Built an intelligent search system using Azure Functions, OpenAI embeddings, and LangChain

responsibilities: Implemented error-handling and logging mechanisms to ensure system reliability and robustness.
Conducted workshops on fine-tuning LLMs, emphasizing rapid prototyping of AI features for real-world applications.

responsibilities.text: Developed VDPS.AI, a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot

responsibilities: Contributed to open-source projects to foster innovation in AI.
Created the TELOS Project using the Socratic Five Whys Method to support users in analyzing and resolving complex problems.
Advocated for AI in global inclusion and sustainability.
Coordinated cross-functional teams for engineering projects, building valuable management skills now leveraged in AI endeavors.
Managed the planning, design, construction, and maintenance of water management and drip irrigation systems.

responsibilities.text: Designed SaaS software for real-time visualization of manufacturing KPIs for Pfaff

responsibilities: Worked with an agile, cross-functional team using machine learning and data analysis techniques.
Conducted feasibility tests using design thinking and implemented MVPs with user story mapping.

projects.description: Developed a cloud-based CV indexing and retrieval system, improving document processing and searchability.
Collaborated on the AgenticAICoach project to enable collaborative AI agents for scalable coaching of entrepreneurial teams.
Developed a Q&A chatbot for workshops utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Focused on improving user engagement and knowledge sharing in educational settings.

name.text: Automatic Surgical Tool and Phase Detection

projects.description: Achieved competitive results in detecting surgical tools and phases during minimally invasive surgeries. Developed multitask CNN and TCN architectures for real-time object detection and action segmentation.
Designed SaaS software to visualize real-time manufacturing KPIs.

title.text: Introduction to GPT-3 and Finetuned Virtual Assistants

workshops.overview: Explored GPT-3 basics, dataset preparation, and fine-tuning for creating Flask-based virtual assistants.

title.text: Fine-Tuning Large Language Models for Virtual Assistants

workshops.overview: Covered fine-tuning LLMs for domain-specific applications and introduced open-source alternatives.

title.text: Fine-Tuning Large Language Models for Real-World Applications

workshops.overview: Delivered advanced methods for Llama-2 fine-tuning and deployment on AWS Sagemaker.

title.text: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG): From Basics to Advanced Applications

workshops.overview: Detailed success criteria and use cases for RAG in customer support and regulatory analysis.
Introduced text-image multimodal pipelines for document analysis and healthcare automation.

education.institution: IU International University of Applied Sciences, Germany

Thesis: "Optimum Design of Prestressing of Cylindrical Shells" (Grade: 95/110)

hobbies_and_interests: AI Innovation: Exploring advancements in Generative AI, LLMs, and AI applications in creative industries.
Creative Problem-Solving: Tackling challenging problems through thought experiments and innovative solutions.
Technology Trends: Staying ahead of emerging tech, including advancements in AI and large-scale deployments.

title.text: Rethinking Creative Practices: The Impact of Generative AI on Design, Design Thinking, and Content Creation
